abstract: In the Senate, the president’s defense says impeachment is not a remedy to defied subpoenas. But a Justice Department lawyer says the opposite.
lead_paragraph: As he stood up to answer a question on Thursday, Representative Adam B. Schiff of California, the lead Democratic House manager, said that on the same day that President Trump’s lawyers were fighting his impeachment in the Senate, the president’s own Justice Department was making a contrary argument in federal court.
